name: Build a thing - Godot Wild Jam #53
name_original: Build a thing - Godot Wild Jam #53
description:
In remembrance of the old flash game "Incredibots" I created this game during Godot Wild Jam #53.

This was my very first game jam.

You can build your own vehicle and drive it through a level.

Have fun :)

Thank you bitbrain for publishing https://github.com/bitbrain/godot-gamejam
